For the second day in a row, both gold and silver prices recorded a dip on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Thursday, September 28, 2023.

articles.author: Rishabh Mishra
articles.title: MCX Shares At 23-Month High Driven By Surge In Crude Contract, Says Morgan Stanley - BQ Prime
articles.description: The company will implement a new derivatives platform from Oct. 3, with the Clearing Corp. conducting a mock session on Oct. 2.
articles.content:
Shares of Multi Commodity Exchange of India Ltd. rose to a 23-month high due to a rise in average daily trading volumes of crude contracts in the September quarter, according to Morgan Stanley.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India central bank likely selling dollars to prevent rupee from falling to record low, traders say - Reuters India
articles.description: India's central bank is likely selling U.S. dollars at around 83.22-83.25 rupee levels to prevent the rupee from heading towards a record low, seven traders said on Thursday.
articles.content: MUMBAI, Sept 28 (Reuters) - India's central bank is likely selling U.S. dollars at around 83.22-83.25 rupee levels to prevent the rupee from heading towards a record low, seven traders said on Thursd… [+371 chars]
